cache.description: Cache the list of installed and outdated packages.

cacheonly.description: Run the yum command entirely from system cache, don't update cache.

code.description: Error code applied when using nikita.service.

installed.description:
Cache a list of installed services. If an array, the service will be
installed if a key of the same name exists; if anything else
(default), no caching will take place.

name.description: Package name, required unless provided as main argument.

outdated.description:
Cache a list of outdated services. If an array, the service will be
updated if a key of the same name exists; If true, the option will be
converted to an array with all the outdated service names as keys; if
anything else (default), no caching will take place.

pacman_flags.description: Additionnal flags passed to the `pacman -S` command.

yay_flags.description: Additionnal flags passed to the `yay -S` command.
